title: Union Berlin ‘foolproof’ venue redo project - Coliseum
snippet: Dirk Zingler, President of the Bundesliga team 1. Union Berlin, announced recently that the planned expansion and renovation of the top-flight’s home ground – the Stadion An der Alten Försterei in Berlin, Germany – has been postponed ...

title: Alte Försterei
snippet: It is the home of the football Bundesliga team 1. FC Union Berlin. However, Alte Försterei is not only a place where football is played – numerous types of events are held here.

title: Union Berlin’s new stadium plans evolve - Coliseum
snippet: German Bundesliga football club 1. FC Union Berlin has revealed more details of the planned renovation of its Stadion An der Alten Försterei.

title: Union Berlin top-notch training center - Coliseum
snippet: ... The 22,012-capacity Stadion An der Alten Försterei is a football stadium in Köpenick (Germany) and the largest single-purpose football stadium in the German capital of Berlin.

title: Union Berlin (Stadion An der Alten Försterei)
snippet: Stadion An der Alten Försterei is the home of Union Berlin, who play in the German Bundesliga.
